ygData.subject: Re: General information about Kerra Island
ygData.msgSnippet: I can pretty much guarantee one of two things. 1.  There is nothing magical or worth platinum on the island. 2.  There are magical items, but you must be 50th
ygData.messageBody:
I can pretty much guarantee one of two things.

1. There is nothing magical or worth platinum on the island.
2. There are magical items, but you must be 50th level to attain these
items, and they aren't worth the effort.

The reason I can guarantee these things is. If there was any magical items
or things worth platinum, the island would be full of campers. This is
unfortunately the way the game works, so if you find an empty zone, the best
you can hope for is that the monsters give good experience. Because there
probably isn't any decent loot.

I could be wrong, it just might be a place that no one has been too, or
bragged about. But these places I'm sure are few and far between, if they
even still exist.

Wenaddar of Cazic-Thule


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Robert Lejeune [SMTP:robert.lejeune@...]
> Sent: Thursday, June 17, 1999 11:49 AM
> To: 'EQCheats'
> Subject: [EQCheats] General information about Kerra Island
>
> From: Robert Lejeune <robert.lejeune@...>
>
> Hail gang, I`m wondering if someone know what kind of items I can find on
> Kerra Island. This place is always empty and I wanna fight there for a
> while but I wanna know if there's something valuable that I can find there
> like magic item or I don't know what =))
>
> Please let me know if you have some onformation about this "Outside
> Dungeon". By the way I`m talking about the real Kerra Island =)) the one
> that we can reach by Toxulia Forest not the one in Erud`s Crossing
>
> Thanks in advance gang
>
> Simbad, Druid on Karana
>
